snippet.title: Eliosi’s Hunt – Launch Trailer | PS4
snippet.description:
Lead Eliosi, a wanna-be bounty hunter, into making his dream come true in this hardcore top-down shooter and platformer. Inspired by classic actions games like Metal Slug and Crash Bandicoot, Eliosi’s Hunt delivers the experience of exploring the mechanics, mastering the game and feeling your actual progress through the gameplay. All that with a modern approach: smooth gameplay, beautifully-crafted graphics and cutting-edge technology.  

http://www.eliosishunt.com/en   

TDZ Games ltda. Copyright 2017
